item.description:
Whatâ€™s it like to fly AROUND THE WORLD...TWICE?

In July, we have company.

Don't miss this rare and exciting joint meeting

This joint meeting of EAA Chapters 673 (Marlborough) and 1454 (Fitchburg) features CarolAnn Garratt, who, with co-pilot Carol Foy, flew a Mooney on a seven-day, 160-hour round-the-world flight last year!

Here's their link:
http://www.alsworldfl...

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 July Meetup
